channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Slack Notification Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Slack Notification Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-1003043|2024-08-05T03:07:18.034Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20slack%20notification%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Slack Notification Plugin 2.19 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-1003044|2024-08-05T03:07:17.889Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20slack%20notification%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Slack Notification Plugin 2.19 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
